description: Situated in a rural setting surrounded by rice fields outside Milan, this restaurant specialises in home-made pasta and breads, vegetables grown in its own garden, and Piedmontese meat cooked in traditional fashion over a barbecue grill. Takeaway produce is also available for purchase.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
